post.body: yes - you don't get that distance problem you get with a copper line.
i imagine you are in effect on a BT line - not cable. Is that the case?
you were great on the One O Clock News...
will blog about this. They say 50Mbps customers won't see any traffic management (at first anyway..)
Hi...yes it was fun. Must look out for your vblogs..
we lke it. Very slow and swedish - but dead atmospheric.. And K Branagh excellent.
sorry - just outside the catchment area!
btw - are you to BETT at Olympia?
free - with ads every ten minutes or so....
oh dear - probably not. mrs cj going to india following day and as i'm away much of jan feel i should be in. what is event?
I did!! Fool that I am....
just bought it from amazon. But was the 2003 remaster the right thing to do?
got em!! Love this xmas playliust crowdsourcing
got it! Plus Greg Lake, Sinatra, Wizzard, Springsteen, Crosby
you're right! love sufjan stevens
what did you get? I ended up buying a pink Ixus for someone in this house...
who has questions they'd like answered about Virgin's 50mbps plan? Already asked them about traffic throttling - any other queries?
Usual last minute edit of Virgin broadband story for One..features @billt. Should be on at 1320
On tube on way to Virgin Media presser. It is going to be a hectic morning.
Irony. Just broadcast about faster broadband using my 64k ISDN line. Works a treat.
http://twitpic.com/t178 - Up to talk broadband on Today at 0650. Dog may join in.
Did first M&S online shopping last night. 24 hrs on they say main item i ordered now not available. FAIL!
i'm trying to blog, while the sound of coughing and spluttering from the afflicted rings round the home...quiet, people!
All enjoyed twelfth night. Then cookathon - bakewell tart, 24 mince pies and a stir fry. Now last week's Wallander.
http://twitpic.com/ssqw - At Twelth Night. Must turn off now
Enough twittering - the water is out in our house and all of W13, and before my shower. if you're sitting next to me at 12th Night - sorry
Testing Twitblogs http://cli.gs/nn2Bha
Run with dog in sodden park, filing on broadband story for Monday, then family outing to Twelfth Night.
Been out for dinner with old friends. Who can explain the strictly saga?
Tree is home, kids are decorating, dog bemused.http://twitpic.com/sgwa
Thanks for Xmas Eve ideas. Can't quite hear any of them being read out by Brian Perkins on Radio 4.....so keep em coming!
Back in the office to find the radio editor demanding a tech story for Christmas Eve.....gawd 'elp us. Any ideas?
Wow I'm on top of a nuclear fusion machine. http://twitpic.com/v8d7
Just arriving at JET for a little light nuclear fusion. http://bit.ly/947q
I know you lot are off for Xmas already. but I'm still working. Off to visit JET, the nuclear fusion research centre.
the neighbours have departed, leaving us with enough booze to last through 2009....nobody drinks seriously these days.
Explaining Twitter to martin Rosenbaum
Anyone else using Spotify? I'm writing about it - and it seems pretty good.
Damn - just bought sufjan stevens on itunes for £15.99 - it's on amazon for £10.98
creating xmas playlist - all the neighbours round for party. Anything I'm missing?
